Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.activity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicActivity
    Base activity to handle everything related to design support and the app compat library.
    DynamicDrawerActivity
    Base drawer activity to handle everything related to the DrawerLayout and com.google.android.material.internal.NavigationMenu.
    DynamicStateActivity
    An activity extending DynamicSystemActivity to maintain state of the widgets and fragments.
    DynamicSystemActivity
    Base activity to perform all the system UI related tasks like status and navigation bar color, theme, etc.
    DynamicWidgetActivity
    An activity to configure widgets having basic configuration methods.
